comments.body: https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/3eb5b22b3b9518153f249e175212141e31a5c605/staging/src/k8s.io/api/flowcontrol/v1alpha1/types.go#L249 says the default is "rbac.authorization.k8s.io", but `GroupName` is "flowcontrol.apiserver.k8s.io".
that's awkward.. should have been fixed in the model pull. updated now

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +45,49 @@			// do nothing
		case v1alpha1.UserKind:
			obj.APIGroup = GroupName
		case v1alpha1.GroupKind:
			obj.APIGroup = GroupName

comments.body: This field is _not_ declared optional, and indeed I think that is correct.  We should force admins to explicitly choose a matching precedence for each FlowSchema because otherwise there are likely to be many that collide without the admin having thought about those collisions.

> A matching priority (default value is 1000);

that doesn't comply w/ the KEP. it's said there is a default value for the field. on the other hand, forcing user to think about a matching-precedence will be against user-experience. there should be a default value and admin is supposed to adjust it to resolve conflict among flow-schemas.

Oh, you're right, I had forgotten that the KEP said there is a default value for that.  Perhaps I never noticed.  I think it is a bad idea and will lead to bad user experience for the reason I stated.  We do not want administrators discovering conflicts (which means bad consequences have happened) and fixing them, we want administrators avoiding the conflicts in the first place.

how many flow-schemas can we expect in a cluster? 20~100-ish? it's tough for administrators to think of a unique and reasonable matching-precedence as it grows.. consider how linux defines `niceness` for process.. we don't have to deal with `niceness ` for every process until hitting issues, do we?
Since the KEP says there is a default value, I will not object here any more to implementing a default value.  I think it is a bad design, and will argue this matter in a KEP update.
We _do_ need defaulting logic that we need for `PriorityLevelConfiguration`.
what field do you think we can default for PL objects?
The types files say "If empty, the hand size will the be set to 1".
